entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$99.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1Ôºö$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro SubscriptionÔºö$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether you‚Äôre scanning for a mesocyclone‚Äôs tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane‚Äôs eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar‚Äôs scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: ‚Ä¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany ‚Ä¢ 6-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Two built-in providers for radar data ‚Ä¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US ‚Ä¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia ‚Ä¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes ‚Ä¢ Inspector and distance tools ‚Ä¢ Color palette options for radar data ‚Ä¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration ‚Ä¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting ‚Ä¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL ‚Ä¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use ‚Ä¢ Support for widgets and complications ‚Ä¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: ‚Ä¢ 30-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes ‚Ä¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions ‚Ä¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks ‚Ä¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US ‚Ä¢ Local storm reports in the US ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support ‚Ä¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: ‚Ä¢ Everything in Pro Tier One ‚Ä¢ 50-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ A third provider for US radar data ‚Ä¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive ‚Ä¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products ‚Ä¢ NSSL‚Äôs Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products ‚Ä¢ NCEP‚Äôs Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products ‚Ä¢ Surface observations ‚Ä¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US ‚Ä¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA ‚Ä¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices ‚Ä¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $19.95 [$19.95 ~ $19.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.95
  • AnnualÔºö$6.00
  • MonthlyÔºö$0.99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions. ‚ñ† KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues ‚Ä¢ Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments ‚ñ† COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies ‚ñ† SMART FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances ‚Ä¢ Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel ‚Ä¢ Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule ‚Ä¢ Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders ‚Ä¢ Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization ‚ñ† MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS We're dedicated to one mission ‚Äî helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Zero One Progrise
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.49

Application Description

Zero One Progrise brings you a complete fan-made encyclopedia of characters, Riders, Drivers, and fun quizzes. Features Character Encyclopedia: Learn about Aruto Hiden, Isamu Fuwa, Yua Yaiba, Gai Amatsu, Horobi, Jin, and more. Rider Gallery: Explore Zero-One, Vulcan, Valkyrie, Thouser, Horobi, Jin, and their different forms. Driver Showcase: Discover the Hiden Zero-One Driver, AIMS Shotriser, Thousandriver, and more ‚Äì tap to play original transform sounds. Quiz Challenge: Test your knowledge of characters, forms, and story details with fun trivia games. Immersive Experience: Relive the excitement with custom artwork and sound effects. Disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan app.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö$0.99
  • Hello World!Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions. Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world. How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune. Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff? You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again! Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you! Pump it up and chill ;) **************** Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Sha'traÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]

  • AshbiteÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • SaitamÔºö$2.99
  • BonehartÔºö$4.99
  • Captain BlackthorneÔºö$0.99
  • Sha'traÔºö$0.99
  • NivusÔºö$0.99
  • GrawlÔºö$0.99
  • KahzÔºö$2.99
  • KarkinosÔºö$0.99
  • AshbiteÔºö$4.99
  • KutsaoÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of army with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$27.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $27.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • All-in-One PackÔºö$5.99
  • New Content! Magic CarpetÔºö$2.99
  • New Content! Astronomy SetÔºö$2.99
  • New Content! Pixel RingÔºö$2.99
  • Boss Monster Model SetÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX! ‚óÜ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST! In this ‚ÄúBlock-Building RPG‚Äù, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard! ‚óÜ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES! You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat! ‚óÜ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE! In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins. From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands! ‚óÜ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED! Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island! ‚óÜ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES New DLC added in ‚ÄúTerra Incognita,‚Äù the land where you can freely build and play! DLC includes: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMagic carpet‚Äù, ‚ÄúBoss figure pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúCelestial pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúDot ring‚Äù ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAll in one pack‚Äù (A set of the above 4) *Please be aware of duplicate purchases. "OS: iOS 13 or later iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)" *Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

‚ÄúÁ¥´ÂæÆ‚ÄùÂ∞±ÊòØ‚ÄúÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‚ÄùÂÖ®ÈÉ®ÊòüÊõúÁöÑÈ¶ñÈ†òÂíå‰ª£Ë°®„ÄÇÊåâÁÖßÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‰∏≠ÊòüÊõúÁöÑÂäÉÂàÜÊñπÊ≥ï,ÂÖ®ÈÉ®ÊòüÊõúÂàÜÁÇ∫ÂåóÊñó„ÄÅÂçóÊñóÂíå‰∏≠Â§©‰∏âÂÄãÁ≥ªÁµ±,‚ÄúÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‚Äù‰∏≠ÁöÑ‚ÄúÈ¨•‚ÄùÂ∞±ÊòØÂçóÂåó‰∫åÊñóÁöÑÊÑèÊÄù„ÄÇËá≥Êñº‚ÄúÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‚Äù‰∏≠ÁöÑ‚ÄúÊï∏‚ÄùÊåáÁöÑÊòØÂêâÂá∂Á¶çÁ¶èÁöÑÊ∞£Êï∏„ÄÇÂõ†Ê≠§,ÊâÄË¨Ç‚ÄúÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‚ÄùÂ∞±ÊòØÂ∞á‰∫∫Âá∫ÁîüÁöÑÂπ¥ÊúàÊó•ÊôÇÊåâÁÖßÁâπÂÆöÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÊèõÁÆóÁÇ∫‰ª•Á¥´ÂæÆÊòüÁÇ∫È¶ñÁöÑÂçóÂåó‰∫åÊñóÊòüËæ∞ÊéíÂ∏É‰æÜÊé®ÁÆó‰∫∫‰∏ÄÁîüÂêâÂá∂Á¶çÁ¶è„ÄÅÂëΩÈÅãÊ∞£Êï∏ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁ®ÆË°ìÊï∏„ÄÇÁ¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∏‰πüÁ∞°Á®±ÁÇ∫Á¥´ÂæÆÈ¨•ÊàñÊñóÊï∏,Ë¢´ÂëΩÁêÜÁïåÁ®±ÁÇ∫‰∏âÂ§ßÁ•ûÊï∏‰πãÈ¶ñ„ÄÇ ‚óèÂçÅ‰∫åÂÆÆÈ°ØÁ§∫:ÊòüÊõú„ÄÅÂπ≤ÊîØ„ÄÅÂÆÆÂêç„ÄÅÂçÅ‰∫åÈï∑Áîü„ÄÅÂçöÂ£´ÂçÅ‰∫åÁ•û„ÄÅÂ∞áÂâçÊòü„ÄÅÊ≠≤ÂâçÊòü„ÄÅÂ§ßÈôê„ÄÅÂ∞èÈôê„ÄÇ entry.title: LP Helper Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

Application Description

"LP Helper Pro" is a permanent professional version of the "LP Helper" App. If you buy this version, you can use all professional functions permanently. "LP Helper Pro" includes four modules: map, on-site 3D compass, on-site AR and detailed information. Map - You can choose any position on the map and calculate the direction of the sun, moon, and the Milky Way at that location. You can also find a suitable location for shooting the starry sky through the light pollution map. In addition, we have added a new weather query function on the map. Now you can query the highly localized weather data of any location within 10 days, including weather, temperature, wind direction, wind speed, humidity, visual distance, cloud coverage and other information, accurate to every hour. 3D compass - calculate the direction of the sun, moon and galaxy at the specified location in the form of a 3D compass. Local AR--Use AR to intuitively estimate the position of the sun, moon and galaxy. This function is very practical to predict the composition in advance at the shooting site. On the AR interface, you can also simulate the star track under the specified exposure time. In this way, you can estimate the shooting time required in advance when taking star track photos. Detailed information -- lists various special moments of the day in the current location, as well as the function of the star calendar. In addition, you can also save the selected locations on the map and add various special moments to the calendar for automatic reminders. The time scroll bar at the bottom can switch between multi-clock modes to switch different time spans and help you select time more accurately. In addition, the App also integrates a variety of practical tools, such as depth-of-view calculator, star point calculator, star orbit calculator, and light brush. Privacy Statement: https://blog.csdn.net/syx151/article/details/143922426? Spm=1001.2014.3001.5501 License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
